snippet.name: cffunction
snippet.starttext: <!--- * FUNCTION: $${Function Name:} * insert description here * @param param_name : param desc * @return $${Return Type:any|array|binary|boolean|date|guid|numeric|query|string|struct|uuid|xml|void} : return desc ---> <cffunction name="$${Function Name:}" access="$${Access:private|package|public|remote}" returntype="$${Return Type:any|array|binary|boolean|date|guid|numeric|query|string|struct|uuid|xml|void}" output="$${Output:false|true}" displayname="$${Function Name:}" hint="$${Hint:}">
